content: I opened https://github.com/rust-lang/wg-async-foundations/pull/109 but i realized the tests probably won't pass. I need to go to bed. If anybody wants to take a stab at fixing up SUMMARY.md and making the tests pass, it'd be appreciated. (You have to add ignore to the code snippets)
i can work on this later today (in about ~4 hours from now, or sooner)
ok, you got lucky. i happened to be in a boring meeting, which means i had a few minutes :laughter_tears: wg-async-foundations#110
